profile.summary: Certified HR Professional with 4+  years of experience in Human Resource Business Partnering, Onboarding/Off boarding, Induction, Exit Management,  Benefits Administration, Leave Management, MIS, Learning & Development, Stake holder management and Client management. Experienced working in the FMCG, IT, RPO, contact center, staffing and recruiting industry.
profile.headline: Human Resource at Microsoft

experience.description:
* Complete HR Operations from Hire to Retire.
* Payroll Management - complete process from new joiner to termination
* Benefit enrollment/change
* Quality Checks/Audit
* Employee life cycle handling
* Transfers - domestic and international
* HR System management
* Promotion/salary letters
* Leave of Absence
* Record Management on Oracle and Career Setting (SF)
* To be the front face of HR for the entire organization
* Processing of all major HR Operational work from start to end-Handling LOP, Domestic transfers,
* Employee benefits Management, Employee Database Management in Oracle.
* Employment Verification of ex employees.
* Act as a link between the employees & all other operational divisions of the organization
* Responsible for the communication of all information at the right time & right place
experience.title: Human Resources Associate

experience.description:
•	Responsible for defining and implementing various HR systems.
•	Screening the candidates by reviewing resumes & credentials.
•	Conducting preliminary telephonic interviews to assess the suitability of the candidates in terms of appropriateness of work experience, technical skills, qualifications, salary expectations, aspirations, communication skills.
•	Scheduling the candidate who matches the expectations through direct interviews.
•	Interviewing the candidate from the HR perspective for credential evaluation and position specification.
•	 Issue of Offer Letter, Appointment letter, Confirmation, Reliving, Experience Letters.
•	 Frequently following up with the candidate till their date of joining
•	Taking care of all the joining formalities of new entrants.
•	Responsible for articulating and negotiating pay scale with selected candidates and communicating all aspects of the offer including the salary and benefits.
•	 Onboarding and Offboarding
•	Maintaining personal data
experience.title: Senior Human Resources Specialist

certifications.name: HR Analytics - Analytics in Talent Management

volunteer.companyName: Ministry of Women and Child Affairs, Government of India
